name: echo-server
full_description:
Echo Server
==========

Echo Server is a container-ready, multi-scalable Node.js application used to host your own Socket.IO server for Laravel.

This is a fork of the original [Laravel Echo Server package](https://github.com/tlaverdure/laravel-echo-server).

For documentation, check [soketi/echo-server](https://github.com/soketi/echo-server)

Available versions
===============

**Starting from 4.4.0, Buster & Stretch got removed and only Alpine images are being built.**

Each of the image tags is formatted like this:

`soketi/echo-server:[git_version]-[node-version]`

```bash
$ docker pull soketi/echo-server:4.4.0-14-alpine
```

The following versions are available:

- `[git_version]-14-alpine`
- `[git_version]-12-alpine`
- `[git_version]-10-alpine`

### Latest Major-Minor Tag

There is also support for major.minor tag release in the image:

- `4.0-14-alpine`
- `4.0-12-alpine`
- `4.0-10-alpine`

**Instead of `4.0`, any `major.minor` is acceptable.**

## Latest Tag

The latest tags for each individual Node.js versions are formatted like this:

`soketi/echo-server:latest-[node-version]`

```bash
$ docker pull soketi/echo-server:latest-lts-alpine
```
